text:
Hi,
You could also have a PBR (Push Button Reset) partition at the end that is also
a recovery partition.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/deploy-windows-re?view=windows-11#prepare-a-diskpart-script-to-identify-the-recovery-partitions-and-to-hide-drive-letters

metadata.topic: more recovery partition stuff - this is W11 specific
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] more recovery partition stuff - this is W11 specific
